wikipedia_page.main: Danny Steele (born 10 October 1982) is an English footballer who played in The Football League as a defender.

response: Coban fought more than 270 fights in his 23-year career. His last fight was against former student Danny Steele at the Warrior’s Cup in California in September 2000. Despite not having fought in 3 years, Coban won the match.
